Uses of Package
com.novartis.opensource.yada

  • Packages that use com.novartis.opensource.yada 
    Package Description
    com.novartis.opensource.yada  
    com.novartis.opensource.yada.adaptor  
    com.novartis.opensource.yada.format  
    com.novartis.opensource.yada.io  
    com.novartis.opensource.yada.plugin  
    com.novartis.opensource.yada.util  
  • Classes in com.novartis.opensource.yada used by com.novartis.opensource.yada 
    Class and Description
    JSONParams
    A LinkedHashMap implementation for storing values passed to the YADA Service, by way of YADARequest in the url parameters or http POST content.
    JSONParamsEntry
    An internally used data structure encapsulating data and params associated to a YADAQuery via qname, passed to the framework in a request.
    QueryManager
    QueryManager is a workhorse class that performs essential query preparation tasks prior to execution.
    YADAConnectionException
    Thrown when the attempt to open or close a source connection fails.
    YADAException
    The top of the YADA exception handling hierarchy.
    YADAExecutionException
    Thrown by various methods when catching a variety of other execution exceptions.
    YADAExpressionDeParser
    A subclass of net.sf.jsqlparser.util.deparser.ExpressionDeParser which is called during com.novartis.opensource.yada.Adaptor processing of UPDATE statement WHERE clauses.
    YADAFinderException
    Thrown when Finder encounters a runtime exception, usually due to an attempt to retrieve an unknown query.
    YADAParam 
    YADAParserException
    Thrown when an error is encountered by the Parser while parsing SQL.
    YADAQuery
    The processing unit for a YADA query, containing the following, where applicable: Stored code Parsed code List of YADAParams Lists of PreparedStatements for query and result count List of CallableStatements List of URLs List of cookie names, for REST queries, where specified Array of parameterized columns Array of columns referenced by SQL IN clauses SQL transactional info Connection SOAPConnection List of list of values to be processed List of YADAQueryResults JDBCAdaptor class and object
    YADAQueryConfigurationException 
    YADAQueryResult
    A container for storing indexed query results, their converted forms, and row counts.
    YADARequest
    A utility class for marshalling url params into instance variables, and serving as a portable structure for passing parameter values across layers of the API.
    YADARequestException
    Thrown when there is an issue parsing the YADA request parameters.
    YADAResourceException
    Thrown when an attempt to access a object in the application context or system properties fails.
    YADAUnsupportedAdaptorException
    Thrown when attempting to instantiate an Adaptor subclass that doesn't exist, can't be found, or another exception is thrown while so doing.
  • Classes in com.novartis.opensource.yada used by com.novartis.opensource.yada.adaptor 
    Class and Description
    YADAException
    The top of the YADA exception handling hierarchy.
    YADAQuery

    YADARequest
    A utility class for marshalling url params into instance variables, and serving as a portable structure for passing parameter values across layers of the API.
    YADASQLException
    Thrown when encountering an error while processing SQL.
